problem_text_cn: 如图,点O的四边形ABCD内一点,OA=OB=OC,AD⊥CD,∠ABC=60°,则∠DAO+∠DCO的大小为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, there is a point in the quadrilateral ABCD of point O, OA = OB = OC, AD ⊥ CD, ∠ABC = N_0, then the size of ∠DAO + ∠DCO is ()
raw_answer:
:根据四边形的内角和定理可得:∠DAB+∠DCB=360°-60°-90°=210°,∵OA=OB=OC,∠ABC=60°,∴∠OAB=∠OBA,∠OCB=∠OBC,∴∠OAB+∠OCB=60°,∴∠DAO+∠DCO=210°-60°=150°．
故选:D．
raw_comment: 本题考查四边形内角和的定理及等腰三角形的性质,解题时要将二者有机的结合在一起．
